name: LAIConversationGuide
0: ”Alexa, open the L A I Conversation Guide”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the l. a. i. conversation guide
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is intended for Healthcare Professionals (HCPs), Mental Healthcare Professionals (MHCPs), Nurse Practitioners (NPs), and Psychiatrists within the United States who treat adult patients with schizophrenia. This skill is not intended for consumers. The information in this skill is for educational purposes only and does not replace professional medical instructions or information about LAIs. For more information or professional advice about LAIs, talk to your doctor. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
HCPs become the lead of this immersive storytelling experience. Interact with virtual patients and caregivers by selecting from multiple decisions at key points in the stories to affect how the events unfold. Select from three patients to begin the interactive audio stories and respond aloud to the narrator’s prompts to advance through each discussion. Each story ends in the patient agreeing to a long-acting injectable (LAI) or ending the conversation, providing a valuable teaching experience and conversation tips for discussing treatment options.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
